statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks WHERE task_type = 'Cleaning' ORDER BY task_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, energy_consumption FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_time FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks WHERE energy_consumption < 50;
SELECT * FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks WHERE task_type IN ('Maintenance', 'Repairs') ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT MAX(energy_consumption) AS max_energy_consumption FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks;
SELECT * FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY task_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_type, energy_consumption FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks WHERE task_type = 'cleaning' AND task_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY task_time;
SELECT task_name, task_type, energy_consumption FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks WHERE task_type IN ('washing', 'drying') ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_type, task_time FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks WHERE energy_consumption BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tasks, AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_energy_consumption FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks WHERE task_time < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM laundry_schedule;
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM laundry_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT id, task_name FROM laundry_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ev_charging_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 'ABC123';
SELECT id, start_time, end_time, charging_station_id FROM ev_charging_schedule;
SELECT * FROM laundry_schedule WHERE task_name = 'Washing' AND start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM laundry_schedule WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ev_charging_schedule WHERE charging_station_id = 3 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM laundry_schedule WHERE end_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, vehicle_id, charging_station_id FROM ev_charging_schedule WHERE start_time < '2022-06-01' AND end_time > '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM laundry_schedule;
SELECT id, task_name, start_time, end_time FROM vehicle_charging ORDER BY charge_start_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, start_time FROM peak_demand_reduction WHERE reduction_amount > 100 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_charging WHERE vehicle_name = 'Tesla' AND charge_end_time > '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, task_name, reduction_amount FROM peak_demand_reduction WHERE task_name LIKE '%washing%' ORDER BY reduction_amount DESC;
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM laundry_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_charging WHERE charge_start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM peak_demand_reduction GROUP BY task_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM laundry_schedule WHERE start_time < '2022-06-01';
SELECT vehicle_name, charge_start_time, charge_end_time FROM vehicle_charging ORDER BY charge_end_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM laundry_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT id, energy_consumed FROM vehicle_schedule WHERE energy_consumed > 50;
SELECT location, available_spaces FROM charging_station WHERE capacity > 5 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT name, address FROM residential_complex WHERE total_units < 100;
SELECT * FROM charging_station WHERE available_spaces > 0;
SELECT * FROM laundry_schedule WHERE energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT id, start_time, end_time FROM vehicle_schedule WHERE end_time < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_time;
SELECT id, location, available_spaces FROM charging_station WHERE capacity > 10 AND available_spaces > 0;
SELECT id, name, total_units FROM residential_complex WHERE total_units BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, address FROM residential_complex WHERE name LIKE '%Garden%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM laundry_schedule;
SELECT id, user_id, start_time FROM laundry_schedule WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, power_consumption, timestamp FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, task_name, reduction_amount, timestamp FROM peak_demand_reduction WHERE reduction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_prices WHERE time_of_day BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '17:00:00';
SELECT * FROM laundry_schedule;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_charging_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, reduction_amount FROM peak_demand_reduction WHERE reduction_amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT device_id, SUM(power_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_consumption > 500 ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT time_of_day, price FROM energy_prices WHERE price BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1 ORDER BY time_of_day;
